General.Name: Unibios Holdings S.A
General.Description: Unibios Holdings S.A., through its subsidiaries, develops and installs water treatment and recycling systems in Europe, Africa, and the Middle East. It provides installation and rental of faced scaffolding; and maintains and installs heating and air conditioning equipment. The company was formerly known as Biossol SA and changed its name to Unibios Holdings S.A. in July 2008. Unibios Holdings S.A. was incorporated in 1940 and is based in Ano Liosia, Greece.
